title: 1.9带tag的女巫召唤出来后很快就消失了
author: mineconan
txt_content:
rt
/summon Witch 169 63 -211 {CustomName:"[炼药师]孢子·沃特",NoAI:1b,Silent:1b,Rotation:[-90f,0f]}
用这个指令召唤女巫没什么问题
一旦我加上Tags:[potioner]，就变成了标题里说的那样

replies.author: mineconan
replies.txt_content:
⊙v⊙ 发表于 2018-1-1 11:50
有毒...试试["potioner"]
显然，没用……

replies.author: sjx
replies.txt_content: 可能是despawn 试试加上 PersistenceRequired:1b

replies.author: mineconan
replies.txt_content:
sjx 发表于 2018-1-1 12:20
可能是despawn 试试加上 PersistenceRequired:1b
完了，还是没用

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content: 没用是指能召唤但是很快消失？如何消失？

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
你先输入这个就好了
/difficulty easy

乖乖关掉和平
经测试这命令完全没问题/summon Witch 169 63 -211 {CustomName:"[炼药师]孢子·沃特",NoAI:1b,Silent:1b,Rotation:[-90f,0f],Tags:[potioner]}复制代码

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
pineapple_ 发表于 2018-1-1 14:41
你先输入这个就好了
/difficulty easy
是/difficulty easy复制代码
输成url了

replies.author: pca006132
replies.txt_content:
很明显那tag是不会影响实体的
你是不是设置了啥其他命令...
比如kill @e[tag=potioner]啥的...

replies.author: mineconan
replies.txt_content:
pca006132 发表于 2018-1-1 16:33

你是不是设置了啥其他命令...
